title: Can't check my one status
body: I am having an error pop up whenever I check. Is this happening to anyone else. Ps this is the pbe status my autocorrect was a doosh

replies.body:
I took a look into your account but it doesn't look like you've been accepted into PBE just yet. Be sure to keep an eye out for an email for PBE acceptance. 

As for the error you're getting whenever you try to check your PBE status, what kind of error are you seeing? Feel free to shoot me a picture of it and I'll do my best to help out!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=jeKapacN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-18T21:39:11.102+0000)
>
> I took a look into your account but it doesn't look like you've been accepted into PBE just yet. Be sure to keep an eye out for an email for PBE acceptance. 
> 
> As for the error you're getting whenever you try to check your PBE status, what kind of error are you seeing? Feel free to shoot me a picture of it and I'll do my best to help out!



Sry for responding late had to do some stuff irl. How do you send a picture

You'll need to use any kind of image sharing website in order to send the picture through our boards. I've noticed a lot of our players use [**Gyazo**](https://gyazo.com/en) which is very easy to use and has some neat features as well.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=jeKapacN,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-19T03:43:54.780+0000)
>
> You'll need to use any kind of image sharing website in order to send the picture through our boards. I've noticed a lot of our players use [**Gyazo**](https://gyazo.com/en) which is very easy to use and has some neat features as well.

Thank you for wasting your time with me. I got it to work on my computer but it still won't work on my phone
